keyboardTip: Tip: Use Ctrl+N for new application
applicationPaceContent: You've submitted {{count}} applications this week. Consider spacing them out for better quality and personalization.
industryFocusContent: {{percentage}}% of your applications are in {{industry}}. Consider diversifying or doubling down on this specialization.
linkedinOptimizationContent: Update your LinkedIn headline weekly to reflect your current job search focus and increase visibility.
followupStrategyContent: Send follow-up emails 1-2 weeks after applying. 70% of successful candidates follow up at least once.
applicationTimingContent: Tuesday-Thursday, 10 AM-2 PM are optimal application times. Avoid Mondays and Fridays.
networkLeverageContent: Referrals increase your chances by 5x. Reach out to connections at your target companies.
atsOptimizationContent: Use keywords from job descriptions in your resume. 75% of resumes are filtered by ATS systems.

dashboard.platformDescription: An all-in-one, multilingual career platform powered by AI. Track job applications, build tailored resumes and cover letters, practice interviews with voice or video, and manage your documents — all with intelligent insights to boost your chances of landing the job.
jobDetails.title: Job Details
defaultResumeContent:
John Doe
(123) 456-7890 | john.doe@email.com | linkedin.com/in/johndoe

Summary
A highly motivated Software Engineer with 5+ years of experience in developing scalable web applications. Proficient in JavaScript, React, Node.js, and cloud platforms. Seeking to leverage technical expertise and leadership skills to contribute to innovative projects.

Experience
Senior Software Engineer | Innovatech Solutions | Jan 2021 - Present
- Led a team of 5 engineers in developing a new SaaS product, delivered 2 weeks ahead of schedule.
- Designed and implemented microservices architecture, improving system scalability by 40%.
- Mentored junior developers, fostering a collaborative and growth-oriented team environment.

Software Engineer | Tech Solutions Inc. | Jun 2018 - Dec 2020
- Developed and maintained features for a high-traffic e-commerce platform using React and Redux.
- Optimized application performance, reducing page load times by 25%.
- Collaborated with UX/UI designers to create intuitive and responsive user interfaces.

Education
B.S. Computer Science | University of Technology | 2014 - 2018
- Graduated with Honors (GPA 3.8/4.0)
- President of the Coding Club

Skills
Programming Languages: JavaScript (ES6+), Python, Java
Frameworks/Libraries: React, Node.js, Express, Spring Boot, Redux, Tailwind CSS
Databases: MongoDB, PostgreSQL, MySQL
Tools: Git, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Jenkins
Other: Agile Methodologies, Problem-Solving, Team Leadership

interview.warmup.title: Interview Warm-up
interview.warmup.subtitle: Prepare yourself for a successful interview
interview.warmup.description: Prepare yourself for the interview with confidence-building exercises.
interview.warmup.welcome.benefits.confid: Practice exercises to boost your confidence before the interview
interview.warmup.welcome.benefits.techni: Test your camera, microphone, and environment
interview.warmup.welcome.benefits.practi: Practice with warm-up questions to get comfortable
interview.warmup.welcome.title: Welcome to Your Interview Warm-up
interview.warmup.welcome.description: Take a few minutes to prepare yourself mentally and technically for your interview.
interview.warmup.confidence.title: Build Your Confidence
interview.warmup.confidence.description: Quick exercises to boost your confidence and reduce anxiety.
interview.warmup.confidence.breathing.de: Calm your nerves with focused breathing
interview.warmup.confidence.breathing.st: Sit comfortably with your back straight
Breathe in slowly through your nose for 4 counts
Exhale slowly through your mouth for 6 counts
interview.warmup.confidence.posture.name: Power Posture
interview.warmup.confidence.posture.step: Keep your chin parallel to the floor
Relax your arms at your sides
interview.warmup.confidence.visualizatio: Picture yourself entering the interview room confidently
Feel the satisfaction of a successful interview
interview.warmup.technical.title: Technical Setup
interview.warmup.technical.description: Test your camera, microphone, and environment.
interview.warmup.technical.tip1: Ensure good lighting on your face
interview.warmup.technical.tip4: Keep water nearby to stay hydrated
interview.warmup.practice.title: Quick Practice
interview.warmup.practice.description: Practice with a few warm-up questions.
interview.warmup.practice.questions.whyT: Why are you interested in this role?
interview.warmup.practice.questions.chal: What challenges are you looking for in this position?
interview.warmup.practice.questions.expe: Tell me about a relevant experience.
interview.warmup.complete.title: You're Ready!
interview.warmup.complete.description: Great job completing the warm-up. You're now ready for your interview.

upcomingActions.title: Upcoming Actions & Reminders
aiInsights.tip1: Tailor your resume keywords to match the job description for better ATS compatibility.
aiInsights.tip2: Research the company's recent news, achievements, and culture before your interview.
aiInsights.tip3: Practice the STAR method (Situation, Task, Action, Result)
aiInsights.tip4: Follow up with a personalized thank-you email within 24 hours of your interview.
aiInsights.tip5: Prepare 3-5 thoughtful questions about the role and company to ask your interviewer.
aiInsights.tip6: Update your LinkedIn profile to reflect your interest in similar roles.
aiInsights.tip7: Network with current employees through LinkedIn to gain insider insights.

toddlerDemo.sections.auth.overview.title: Authentication Overview
toddlerDemo.sections.auth.overview.descr: Comprehensive overview of TRAVAIA's authentication system
loginWelcomeMessage: Your AI-powered career companion for job applications and professional growth
errorCreatingAccount: Error creating account. Please try again.
invalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please check your credentials and try again.
emailAlreadyInUse: This email address is already registered. Please use a different email or try logging in.
weakPassword: Password must contain uppercase, lowercase, and numbers
tooManyRequests: Too many failed attempts. Please try again later.
networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
emailNotVerified: Please verify your email address before signing in.
passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
userNotFound: No account found with this email address. Please check your email or create a new account.
accountDisabled: This account has been disabled. Please contact support for assistance.
operationNotAllowed: This sign-in method is not enabled. Please contact support.
invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
passwordTooShortSimple: Password must be at least 6 characters
passwordsDoNotMatchDetailed: Passwords do not match. Please ensure both password fields are identical.
passwordMustContainRequirements: Password must contain at least one {{requirements}}. Please strengthen your password.
requiresRecentLogin: This operation requires recent authentication. Please log in again.
credentialAlreadyInUse: This credential is already associated with a different user account.
accountExistsWithDifferentCredential: An account already exists with this email but different sign-in credentials. Please try signing in with your original method.
emailChangeNeedsVerification: Email change requires verification. Please check your email.
emailAlreadyVerified: This email address is already verified.
expiredActionCode: This action code has expired. Please request a new one.
invalidActionCode: Invalid action code. Please check the link and try again.
missingContinueUri: Continue URL is required for this operation.
unauthorizedContinueUri: The continue URL domain is not authorized.
multiFactorAuthRequired: Multi-factor authentication is required to complete this operation.
secondFactorAlreadyInUse: This second factor is already in use.
maximumSecondFactorCountExceeded: Maximum number of second factors exceeded.
unsupportedFirstFactor: This first factor is not supported.
unverifiedEmail: Please verify your email address before continuing.
appDeleted: This Firebase app has been deleted.
appNotAuthorized: This app is not authorized to use Firebase Authentication.
invalidApiKey: Invalid API key. Please contact support.
invalidUserToken: Your session is invalid. Please log in again.
userTokenExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
webStorageUnsupported: Your browser does not support web storage. Please enable cookies and try again.
providerAlreadyLinked: This account is already linked to this provider.
noSuchProvider: This provider is not linked to your account.
popupBlocked: Sign-in popup was blocked by your browser. Please allow popups and try again.
popupClosedByUser: Sign-in was cancelled. Please try again.
unauthorizedDomain: This domain is not authorized for OAuth operations.
cancelledPopupRequest: Only one popup request is allowed at a time.
captchaCheckFailed: reCAPTCHA verification failed. Please try again.
phoneNumberAlreadyExists: This phone number is already in use by another account.
invalidPhoneNumber: Please enter a valid phone number.
quotaExceeded: SMS quota exceeded. Please try again later.
smsCodeExpired: SMS verification code has expired. Please request a new one.
timeout: Operation timed out. Please try again.
invalidVerificationCode: Invalid verification code. Please try again.
customTokenMismatch: Custom token corresponds to a different Firebase project.
claimsTooLarge: Custom token claims payload is too large.
internalError: An internal error occurred. Please try again.
unknownError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
